attributes.additional_details: I believe we should leave the E.U which the public did not ask for which increases crime & pressure on services.Leave E.U & become how we used to be,making our own goods,instead of importing everything & making other countries rich while we are financially abused by visitors etc.Britains money needs to stay in england,we can deal with countries for certain things but we allow drugs & counterfeit goods in too,along with borders that are not sorted,we have loopholes thats exploited,the public do not trust the gov & we should stop pay increases,expenses & lets see if we stop paing ex M.P'  & P.M's wages,notging promised has been delivered.Shame on the so called ones who look after us..the public,who is skint,public or gov members?

rejection.details: There is already a e-petition about withdrawal from the EU.
